document.full_text: al qaeda considered attacking the u.s. rail sector on the 10th anniversary of the september 11 attacks, u.s. government officials said on thursday in describing intelligence from osama bin laden's hide-out in pakistan.
document.title: al qaeda plotted 9/11 anniversary rail attack: government
lines_and_colors: al qaeda considered attacking the u.s. rail sector on the 10th anniversary of the september 11 attacks, u.s. government officials said on thursday in describing intelligence from osama bin laden's hide-out in pakistan.
